message: Starting extraction of personality disorder details from PDF text. Will systematically extract all 10 disorders across 3 clusters with concrete behaviors, patterns, and clinical examples.
Found personality disorders section in PDF (lines 399-505). Extracting all 10 disorders with concrete behaviors, patterns, and clinical examples. Creating detailed markdown document.

COMPLETED: Extracted all 10 personality disorders across 3 clusters from PDF with comprehensive details. Deliverable: personality_disorders_details.md containing (1) Core features with concrete observable behaviors, (2) Interpersonal/cognitive/emotional/behavioral patterns, (3) 10 clinical examples from PDF, (4) 13 celebrity/historical examples, (5) Key distinguishing features for tricky pairs (OCPD vs OCD, avoidant vs schizoid, borderline vs histrionic/bipolar, narcissistic vs antisocial, schizotypal vs schizophrenia), (6) Cluster comparison summary, (7) Question-writing guidance for 20+ personality disorder questions with focus on mechanisms and concrete behaviors.
